_aChangeLog.text: Updated NAV-file (Completely reworked Navigation Mesh: The movements of bots through the map was improved as much as possible)
Navigation Mesh improved: a more smoothness move on the wooden footbridges (Ramp)

_sText:
PHARAOH

Bomb/Defuse Map for Counter-Strike: Source

CS:GO original map creator: Motanum
CS:S map port creator: Niko
Navigation Mesh editor: Meurglis3

High-quality port for CS:S of same-named midsize map from CS:GO by Motanum / Eugenio Roman. Map set on a fictional Egyptian theme park section. This port contains some constructive and visual changes in comparison with the original, which was made for bigger detailing and improvement of the gameplay smoothness.

Story:
   A few weeks from the grand opening of Pharaoh's Curse, the new roller coaster at Roaring Peaks has been picked as the target of the Phoenix Connection.

P.S. ~ My name is an erased hieroglyph, my clothes are patched by the wind... :-)
